translationtableentry.text: Impara a giocare a Imperivm: Le Grandi Battaglie di Roma.
translationtableentry.result: Learn to play Imperivm: Great Battles of Rome.

translationtableentry.text: Aprende a jugar Imperivm: Las Grandes Batallas de Roma.
translationtableentry.result: Learn to play Imperivm: Great Battles of Rome.
